thread.title: Mangaluru: Group chases and assaults college students, injures one
thread.title_full: Mangaluru: Group chases and assaults college students, injures one | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna webdesk
title: Mangaluru: Group chases and assaults college students, injures one
text:
dna Research & Archives A group chased a few college students and after dragging them out of a bus, assaulted one of them in Mangaluru on Tuesday, The Hindu reports.
The police arrested five people and a 16-year-old boy as well, in connection with the incident. One of the victims, a final year Economics student of Mangalore University, filed a complaint with Konaje police.
The report states that five students (two boys and three girls) had gone to Ullal since they had no classes. They belonged to different religions and had gone to both Bhagawati temple and Sayyid Madani Darga before going to the Ullal beach.
They noticed they were being followed by six people and decided to get back to university. When they got into the bus at Thokkottu, the boys were apparently dragged out the bus and questioned why they were with the girls. The group took one of the boys away in an auto and beat him up.The students were then taken to the police station by a police officer who was patrolling the campus.
